channel.title: How can i make my client public for others in .bat format?
channel.description:
Hello! I made my server and client: [url=http://img4.imageshack.us/i/utennavnjt.jpg/][img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5554/utennavnjt.th.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://img691.imageshack.us/i/utennavn1.jpg/][img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/5460/utennavn1.th.jpg[/img][/url] but ive seen other servers that has "Download Client"! And then you get a .zip with a .bat file in, and when you click the .bat it opens a client that is connected to his server.
And i tried searching, and searching... and searching... but i cant find a tutorial that tells me how to do that...
so, can any of you teach me how to do it or give me a link to a tutorial??
Thanks :)
